post.title: Cloud, What is Next - Lost in the Cloud
post.excerpt: For some, the cloud almost has a mystic allure. People can think there is a magic wand and you wave it and it just works. There is no wand, and itâ€™s easy to take some of what the cloud does for granted. One of the first things that come to mind is security. The cloud touts itself as being more secure, however, it should never be a question of if you will be hacked, or attempted, it is a question of when and how you will respond.
